RACES.name: Dwarf
RACES.feature: Stout. Start with +2 HP. Roll hit points per level with advantage.

RACES.name: Elf
RACES.feature: Farsight. You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons or a +1 bonus to spellcasting checks.

RACES.name: Goblin
RACES.feature: Keen Senses. You can't be surprised.

RACES.name: Half-orc
RACES.feature: Mighty. You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with melee weapons.

RACES.name: Halfling
RACES.feature: Stealthy. Once per day, you can become invisible for 3 rounds.

RACES.name: Human
RACES.language: Common language and one additional common language (pg. 32)
RACES.feature: Ambitious. You gain one additional talent roll at 1st level.
